item.title: 'Show' Adaptative Segue Error
item.description: On our projects we use multiple UIStoryboard files to break our apps; yes, we use storyboards, we are drinking Apple’s “Kool-Aid” and personally they are real time savers and let us focus on improving the experience and enforcing the business rules. Fist Glimpse Of The Problem Although this “embracing the change” would come to hunts us with a weird bug that was reported to us; hitting a “share” button was yielding no actions…
